title: [Large-Scale] Development of English Learners' Causal Expressions: Practitioner-Tailored Education via Usage-Based Approaches

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate English vocabulary in scientific fields and basic grammar knowledge
context.additional_context: Aimed at improving causal expression skills required for scientific documentation in practical settings.

learning_goals: Learners can use causal expressions (MAKE, HAVE, LET) with 80% accuracy in contextually appropriate situations.
Learners can recognize mother-tongue interference factors and select appropriate causal expressions in scientific contexts.
Learners can analyze causal expression patterns in authentic texts using frequency analysis tools (Corpus Tool).
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
